page.title: 14Childrens' games 1985
page.content: In the winter the boys play football with Mr Giles and the girls play netball with Mrs Watson. We like to play a game where the girls and the boys attack each other, we call it mental busters. We like to play other games called; tig, polo, army, cops and robbers, hide and seek, acki 1 2 3, Queenie, racing, camps, bat and ball. On sports day we do lots of races; they are running, skipping, hoop, obstacle, bean bag, relay and egg and spoon. In the summer we play cricket and rounders. It is good fun. The girls usually win at cricket.
